General.Name: Ahlers AG
General.Description: Ahlers AG, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture, production, and distribution of men's fashion products in Germany, Austria, Switzerland, rest of Europe, Russia, and Canada. The company offers its products under the Baldessarini, Pierre Cardin, Otto Kern, Pioneer Jeans, and Pionier Workwear brand names. It markets and sells its products through physical retail, chain, and department stores; mono-brand stores; outlets; and online shops. Ahlers AG was founded in 1919 and is headquartered in Herford, Germany. The company operates as a subsidiary of WTW-Beteiligungsgesellschaft mbH.

2.Name: Mr. Gerri  Pasturi
2.Title: Head of Shirts and Knitwear Division for Pierre Cardin
